entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Abbotsford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:06 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 7:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: NE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening. Rain at times mixed with light snow beginning near midnight. Snowfall amount 4 cm over higher terrain. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.summary: Rain or snow. Windy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
